PageWidgetPortable.Title: Usuários
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>CLOUD_Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS.CADASTRO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT USUARIO FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOEMPRESAS WHERE EMPRESA = @EMPRESA)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Erp/Cadastro/Usuario.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
